sources.title: Lovers And Lollipops ( 1956)
sources.description: Plot: Ann, an attractive widowed New York model, lives in an apartment with her daughter Peggy. The courtship of Ann by visiting engineer Larry, and accompanying misadventures, are seen alternately from their and Peggy's viewpoint. Filmed realistically at many New York locations.

sources.title: Lovers and Lollipops (1956) Lori March, Gerald S. O'Loughlin, Cathy Dunn | Full Movie, subtitled
sources.description:
Ann, an attractive widowed New York model, lives in an apartment with her daughter Peggy. The courtship of Ann by visiting engineer Larry, and accompanying misadventures, are seen alternately from their and Peggy's viewpoint. Filmed realistically at many New York locations.

Directors & Writer: Morris Engel, Ruth Orkin
Stars: Lori March, Gerald S. O'Loughlin, Cathy Dunn 
Genre: Romance, Drama
Budget: $30,000-$35,000

@CCC socials:

metadata.Plot: Ann, an attractive widowed New York model, lives in an apartment with her daughter Peggy. The courtship of Ann by visiting engineer Larry, and accompanying misadventures, are seen alternately from their and Peggy's viewpoint. Filmed realistically at many New York locations.
metadata.Writer: Morris Engel, Ruth Orkin, Mary-Madeleine Lanphier
metadata.Actors: Lori March, Gerald S. O'Loughlin, Cathy Dunn
